payload.description: Architectural Decision Records for the Annotated Container project.
Architectural Decision Records for the Annotated Container project.

release.body:
This patch resolves a dependency upgrade problem, where the following versions of cspray/annotated-container-adr could not be supported with cspray/annotated-container 2.x:

- 3.2
- 3.3

These releases rely on a version of cspray/annotated-target that is not supported until Annotated Container v3. This patch downgrades required dependencies to use a supported version of Annotated Target.

**If you are using the listed versions of this library, please upgrade to 3.3.1**
release.short_description_html:
This patch resolves a dependency upgrade problem, where the following versions of cspray/annotated-container-adr could not be supported with cspray/annotated-container 2.x:

  • 3.2
  • 3.3
